episode_event_halloween_2023/4001_1001_0: We’re almost ready to open the museum!

We have fine art, historic artifacts, geological
specimens... I can’t wait for the grand opening!
Of course! This is MY collection, after all.

This exhibition will also feature valuable items
just excavated from a certain archeological site!

Both of you are experts in fossils and history.
I don’t think you’ll have any problem managing
the exhibits, will you?

Of course not! I’m the director of a museum,
after all. Leave management to me!

Unfortunately, there’s a different kind of problem
we need to resolve.

After the exhibits were brought into the museum,
a rumor started circulating that you can hear the
sound of sobbing there at night.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4001_1001_1:
A security guard actually heard the crying, so
perhaps there’s an object among the exhibits
that’s haunted...

If we can’t guarantee the safety of our visitors,
we may have to cancel the exhibition.

Oh no! But that’d be such a waste of these
wonderful exhibits!

So, I want the two of you to help me identify
what’s causing this strange phenomenon.
Understood! We’ll figure out what’s going on!

Sure, I’ll help as well. I’d feel sorry for the exhibits
if they were just put away without anyone
enjoying them.
I’ll leave it to the two of you, then!
episode_event_halloween_2023/6801_1031_0:
The sound of sobbing...
Quite unusual, isn’t it?
episode_event_halloween_2023/6801_1001_0:
We must explain the sounds of sobbing heard in
the museum at night...
A lost visitor? No, no, that’s not possible...
Ahahaha! You could actually be right?
After all, it’s not just people that get lost!
episode_event_halloween_2023/4002_1101_0:
Roxanne and Lenora waited until nightfall and met
just before the strange phenomenon was rumored
to occur. And then...
episode_event_halloween_2023/4002_1001_0: Oh, she showed up when I was waiting for you.

Recently, I’ve been getting this feeling that
someone’s calling out to me.

It was coming from the museum, so I thought I 
could come inside and figure out who it was.

You’re friends with Ghost-type Pokémon, aren’t
you, Phoebe?

Maybe that feeling you had is connected to our
strange phenomenon somehow.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4002_1001_1: Ahaha! Then we better get going and check inside!
It’s great to have a Ghost-type expert helping us!
Y-you both have nerves of steel...

Anyway, if Phoebe is with us, I’ll feel safe no
matter what we encounter!
episode_event_halloween_2023/4003_1001_0:
That’s strange... There shouldn’t be anyone here
right now, but the lights are on.
It feels a little chilly around my feet...
Wait, is that an Icy Rock?!
It’s a stone you give to Pokémon, right?

Exactly. You’d usually give it to Pokémon that can
make it snow.

You’d give a Heat Rock to Pokémon that control
sunlight, and a Damp Rock to Pokémon that
control rain.
Ahahaha! You know a lot, Roxanne!
But I wonder why there’s one on the floor.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4003_1001_1:
Then again, none of our exhibits have been stolen,
so probably not.
Just as I thought! It’s coming from over there!
I don’t think we’re imagining things.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4004_1001_0: Erm... Ah, look! There she is!

What’s the matter, little one? Come now, you can
tell us.

I was playing hide-and-seek, but this place is big
and I got lost...
You’re safe now. Well done for being so brave.

So there was nothing scary happening here
after all.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4004_1001_1: Now then, let’s take her outside.
Wait... My friends are still inside.
Do you have any idea where they might be?

I see... Well, come with us for now so you don’t
get lost again!
episode_event_halloween_2023/4005_1001_0:
This exhibition area has geological formations and
rock excavations from various regions!

Well, I don’t need to be afraid of the strange
phenomenon anymore!

Oh, and this is a geological sample collected from
Mt. Moon in Kanto!

There are many old strata in that area—you
can even find Pokémon fossils!
Wow! You know a lot about stones!

I do! I have an acquaintance who is a rock
maniac, but I’m no different!

Then what about these? They look like a coffin
and a slab. I guess they don’t have any
association with geology...
episode_event_halloween_2023/4005_1001_1: Maybe they’re from an ancient excavation?

Th-they moved?! Maybe there really was a
haunted—
episode_event_halloween_2023/4006_1001_0: That’s Cofagrigus?! And the other one is...

Runerigus! I’ve heard about them from
Galar Trainers.

Maybe these wild Pokémon got mixed up with the
objects we’re putting on display and brought here
by accident.

Yikes... If we battle here, our exhibits might get
damaged. We probably should escape for now...
Everyone, calm down. We don’t need to panic.
episode_event_halloween_2023/4006_1001_1: Cofagrigus and Runerigus are her friends.

See? Both of them look happy! They’re excited to
see her again!

These two are really nice Pokémon! They play
games with me!

They wanna to become “sync pairs” and have lots
of battles!
They felt that way after coming to this island!
But I can’t be their partner...
Can you be “sync pairs” with them?
episode_event_halloween_2023/4006_1001_2: Ahaha! It seems like she likes you!
Don’t be scared, Roxanne. Look closely at her.

Her body looks like clay, or even stone. That’s a
very unusual composition!
Sure! I think we’ll get along!
Ahahaha! Of course you’d notice that, Roxanne!
Anyway, case closed! Let’s all go home now!
episode_event_halloween_2023/4007_1001_0:
We were able to find out the truth behind the
strange phenomenon!

Now we should be able to open the museum
as planned!

Yeah! All these great things happened, and we
even made new friends!
Let’s learn more about Runerigus and Cofagrigus!

I know! Could you tell us what kind of games
you played with Runerigus—
Oh? Where did that girl go?
Hmm? She was there a minute ago...

She was worried about the two of you because
you were brought here from somewhere
far away, right?
episode_event_halloween_2023/4007_1001_1: Good night. Your friends are OK now.
